Module opentdk.api
Package org.opentdk.api.application

Class EBaseSettings

java.lang.Object
org.opentdk.api.dispatcher.BaseDispatcher
org.opentdk.api.application.EBaseSettings
public class EBaseSettings
extends BaseDispatcher
Settings class with predefined set of common application settings of type BaseDispatchComponent. This class will be used as superclass to inherit the declared variables to application specific subclasses.

Usage sample:
 public class EApplicationSettings extends EBaseSettings{
        ...
 }
Author:
LK Test Solutions GmbH

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static BaseDispatchComponent APP_LOGFILE
    The variable APP_LOGFILE defines the full path and name of the file, where MLogger will log all messages and errors.
    static BaseDispatchComponent APP_LOGFILE_KEEP_AGE
    The variable APP_LOGFILE_KEEP_AGE defines maximum age of logfile in days.
    static BaseDispatchComponent APP_LOGFILE_LIMIT
    The variable APP_LOGFILE_LIMIT defines the maximum size in kilobyte of the logfile.
    static BaseDispatchComponent APP_TRACE_LEVEL
    The variable APP_TRACE_LEVEL defines the level off logging messages by MLogger.

    EBaseSettings()  

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • APP_LOGFILE

      public static final BaseDispatchComponent APP_LOGFILE
      The variable APP_LOGFILE defines the full path and name of the file, where MLogger will log all messages and errors.

    • APP_LOGFILE_LIMIT

      public static final BaseDispatchComponent APP_LOGFILE_LIMIT
      The variable APP_LOGFILE_LIMIT defines the maximum size in kilobyte of the logfile. When the limit is exceeded, MLogger archives the file with a date stamp and a new file will be created.

    • APP_LOGFILE_KEEP_AGE

      public static final BaseDispatchComponent APP_LOGFILE_KEEP_AGE
      The variable APP_LOGFILE_KEEP_AGE defines maximum age of logfile in days. MLogger automatically deletes the file in case the age is exceeded.

    • APP_TRACE_LEVEL

      public static final BaseDispatchComponent APP_TRACE_LEVEL
      The variable APP_TRACE_LEVEL defines the level off logging messages by MLogger.
       0 = disable logging
 1 = log errors only
 2 = log errors and warnings
 3 = log all messages

  • Constructor Details

    • EBaseSettings

      public EBaseSettings()
